mapper.sql: a.xh AS "xh", a.gg_idm AS "ggIdm", a.lc_idm AS "lcIdm", a.yplh AS "yplh", a.ypmc AS "ypmc", a.ypdm AS "ypdm", a.ypdm1 AS "ypdm1", a.ypdm2 AS "ypdm2", a.py AS "py", a.wb AS "wb", a.ypgg AS "ypgg", a.jxdm AS "jxdm", a.fldm AS "fldm", a.zxdw AS "zxdw", a.ggdw AS "ggdw", a.ggxs AS "ggxs", a.cjdm AS "cjdm", a.cjmc AS "cjmc", a.yxq AS "yxq", a.ykdw AS "ykdw", a.ykxs AS "ykxs", a.jhdw AS "jhdw", a.jhxs AS "jhxs", a.mzdw AS "mzdw", a.mzxs AS "mzxs", a.zydw AS "zydw", a.zyxs AS "zyxs", a.ylsj AS "ylsj", a.ypfj AS "ypfj", a.mrjj AS "mrjj", a.sxjg AS "sxjg", a.zfbz AS "zfbz", a.zfbl AS "zfbl", a.zyzfbz AS "zyzfbz", a.zyzfbl AS "zyzfbl", a.gzbz AS "gzbz", a.tsbz AS "tsbz", a.ljlybz AS "ljlybz", a.psbz AS "psbz", a.tybz AS "tybz", a.qzbz AS "qzbz", a.ybxzbz AS "ybxzbz", a.ybkzbz AS "ybkzbz", a.ypkl AS "ypkl", a.zbbz AS "zbbz", a.lrrq AS "lrrq", a.zmlb AS "zmlb", a.ghdw_id AS "ghdwId", a.ghdw_mc AS "ghdwMc", a.yply AS "yply", a.pzwh AS "pzwh", a.gmpbz AS "gmpbz", a.czyh AS "czyh", a.czrq AS "czrq", a.zbdw AS "zbdw", a.mrzbj AS "mrzbj", a.zbqh AS "zbqh", a.dffbz AS "dffbz", a.dydm AS "dydm", a.memo AS "memo", a.babz AS "babz", a.otcbz AS "otcbz", a.bxbz AS "bxbz", a.ypsms AS "ypsms", a.govprice AS "govprice", a.jgyj AS "jgyj", a.cfyp AS "cfyp", a.gfmc AS "gfmc", a.ybmc AS "ybmc", a.gfbz AS "gfbz", a.ybfydj AS "ybfydj", a.syfw AS "syfw", a.syzbz AS "syzbz", a.hybz AS "hybz", a.yzglbz AS "yzglbz", a.sybbz AS "sybbz", a.sgfbz AS "sgfbz", a.islcjsyp AS "islcjsyp", a.lcjsdj AS "lcjsdj", a.tsypglbz AS "tsypglbz", a.tsypcgfs AS "tsypcgfs", a.gybz AS "gybz", a.pzwhxq AS "pzwhxq", a.tbid AS "tbid", a.basicdrug_flag AS "basicdrugFlag", a.jhsyyp_flag AS "jhsyypFlag", a.kjhyp_flag AS "kjhypFlag", a.cfsm AS "cfsm", a.mzbz AS "mzbz", a.sbbxbl AS "sbbxbl", a.icon AS "icon", a.sbjybz AS "sbjybz", a.djybz AS "djybz", a.qtybz AS "qtybz", a.ybbz AS "ybbz", a.kssjb AS "kssjb", a.jsypjb AS "jsypjb", a.kzlypbz AS "kzlypbz"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medsto_ypml( xh, gg_idm, lc_idm, yplh, ypmc, ypdm, ypdm1, ypdm2, py, wb, ypgg, jxdm, fldm, zxdw, ggdw, ggxs, cjdm, cjmc, yxq, ykdw, ykxs, jhdw, jhxs, mzdw, mzxs, zydw, zyxs, ylsj, ypfj, mrjj, sxjg, zfbz, zfbl, zyzfbz, zyzfbl, gzbz, tsbz, ljlybz, psbz, tybz, qzbz, ybxzbz, ybkzbz, ypkl, zbbz, lrrq, zmlb, ghdw_id, ghdw_mc, yply, pzwh, gmpbz, czyh, czrq, zbdw, mrzbj, zbqh, dffbz, dydm, memo, babz, otcbz, bxbz, ypsms, govprice, jgyj, cfyp, gfmc, ybmc, gfbz, ybfydj, syfw, syzbz, hybz, yzglbz, sybbz, sgfbz, islcjsyp, lcjsdj, tsypglbz, tsypcgfs, gybz, pzwhxq, tbid, basicdrug_flag, jhsyyp_flag, kjhyp_flag, cfsm, mzbz, sbbxbl, icon, sbjybz, djybz, qtybz, ybbz, kssjb, jsypjb, kzlypbz ) VALUES ( #{xh}, #{ggIdm}, #{lcIdm}, #{yplh}, #{ypmc}, #{ypdm}, #{ypdm1}, #{ypdm2}, #{py}, #{wb}, #{ypgg}, #{jxdm}, #{fldm}, #{zxdw}, #{ggdw}, #{ggxs}, #{cjdm}, #{cjmc}, #{yxq}, #{ykdw}, #{ykxs}, #{jhdw}, #{jhxs}, #{mzdw}, #{mzxs}, #{zydw}, #{zyxs}, #{ylsj}, #{ypfj}, #{mrjj}, #{sxjg}, #{zfbz}, #{zfbl}, #{zyzfbz}, #{zyzfbl}, #{gzbz}, #{tsbz}, #{ljlybz}, #{psbz}, #{tybz}, #{qzbz}, #{ybxzbz}, #{ybkzbz}, #{ypkl}, #{zbbz}, #{lrrq}, #{zmlb}, #{ghdwId}, #{ghdwMc}, #{yply}, #{pzwh}, #{gmpbz}, #{czyh}, #{czrq}, #{zbdw}, #{mrzbj}, #{zbqh}, #{dffbz}, #{dydm}, #{memo}, #{babz}, #{otcbz}, #{bxbz}, #{ypsms}, #{govprice}, #{jgyj}, #{cfyp}, #{gfmc}, #{ybmc}, #{gfbz}, #{ybfydj}, #{syfw}, #{syzbz}, #{hybz}, #{yzglbz}, #{sybbz}, #{sgfbz}, #{islcjsyp}, #{lcjsdj}, #{tsypglbz}, #{tsypcgfs}, #{gybz}, #{pzwhxq}, #{tbid}, #{basicdrugFlag}, #{jhsyypFlag}, #{kjhypFlag}, #{cfsm}, #{mzbz}, #{sbbxbl}, #{icon}, #{sbjybz}, #{djybz}, #{qtybz}, #{ybbz}, #{kssjb}, #{jsypjb}, #{kzlypbz} )
mapper.update: UPDATE medsto_ypml SET xh = #{xh}, gg_idm = #{ggIdm}, lc_idm = #{lcIdm}, yplh = #{yplh}, ypmc = #{ypmc}, ypdm = #{ypdm}, ypdm1 = #{ypdm1}, ypdm2 = #{ypdm2}, py = #{py}, wb = #{wb}, ypgg = #{ypgg}, jxdm = #{jxdm}, fldm = #{fldm}, zxdw = #{zxdw}, ggdw = #{ggdw}, ggxs = #{ggxs}, cjdm = #{cjdm}, cjmc = #{cjmc}, yxq = #{yxq}, ykdw = #{ykdw}, ykxs = #{ykxs}, jhdw = #{jhdw}, jhxs = #{jhxs}, mzdw = #{mzdw}, mzxs = #{mzxs}, zydw = #{zydw}, zyxs = #{zyxs}, ylsj = #{ylsj}, ypfj = #{ypfj}, mrjj = #{mrjj}, sxjg = #{sxjg}, zfbz = #{zfbz}, zfbl = #{zfbl}, zyzfbz = #{zyzfbz}, zyzfbl = #{zyzfbl}, gzbz = #{gzbz}, tsbz = #{tsbz}, ljlybz = #{ljlybz}, psbz = #{psbz}, tybz = #{tybz}, qzbz = #{qzbz}, ybxzbz = #{ybxzbz}, ybkzbz = #{ybkzbz}, ypkl = #{ypkl}, zbbz = #{zbbz}, lrrq = #{lrrq}, zmlb = #{zmlb}, ghdw_id = #{ghdwId}, ghdw_mc = #{ghdwMc}, yply = #{yply}, pzwh = #{pzwh}, gmpbz = #{gmpbz}, czyh = #{czyh}, czrq = #{czrq}, zbdw = #{zbdw}, mrzbj = #{mrzbj}, zbqh = #{zbqh}, dffbz = #{dffbz}, dydm = #{dydm}, memo = #{memo}, babz = #{babz}, otcbz = #{otcbz}, bxbz = #{bxbz}, ypsms = #{ypsms}, govprice = #{govprice}, jgyj = #{jgyj}, cfyp = #{cfyp}, gfmc = #{gfmc}, ybmc = #{ybmc}, gfbz = #{gfbz}, ybfydj = #{ybfydj}, syfw = #{syfw}, syzbz = #{syzbz}, hybz = #{hybz}, yzglbz = #{yzglbz}, sybbz = #{sybbz}, sgfbz = #{sgfbz}, islcjsyp = #{islcjsyp}, lcjsdj = #{lcjsdj}, tsypglbz = #{tsypglbz}, tsypcgfs = #{tsypcgfs}, gybz = #{gybz}, pzwhxq = #{pzwhxq}, tbid = #{tbid}, basicdrug_flag = #{basicdrugFlag}, jhsyyp_flag = #{jhsyypFlag}, kjhyp_flag = #{kjhypFlag}, cfsm = #{cfsm}, mzbz = #{mzbz}, sbbxbl = #{sbbxbl}, icon = #{icon}, sbjybz = #{sbjybz}, djybz = #{djybz}, qtybz = #{qtybz}, ybbz = #{ybbz}, kssjb = #{kssjb}, jsypjb = #{jsypjb}, kzlypbz = #{kzlypbz} WHERE id = #{id}
